hymn.title: 2012 Winter Training Banner Song 3
hymn.notes: The Crystallization-Study of Daniel and Zechariah

layout.singingstanza: Christ is ev -- ery -- thing for God's build -- ing, and as the en -- graved stone with sev -- en eyes, the top -- stone of grace, He is now trans -- fus -- ing what He is and what He has ac -- com -- plished in -- to our being so that, by be -- com -- ing the same as He is in life and na -- ture but not in the God -- head, we may be His re -- pro -- duc -- tion for the build -- ing of the tem -- ple of God.

lyrics.stanza: Christ is everything for God's building, And as the engraved stone with seven eyes, The topstone of grace, Christ is everything for God's building, And as the engraved stone with seven eyes, The topstone of grace, He is now transfusing what He is And what He has accomplished He is now transfusing what He is And what He has accomplished Into our being So that, by becoming the same as He is In life and nature But not in the Godhead, We may be His reproduction For the building of the temple of God.
